title: The Happening | holiday prep and NYC trip recap
itunes:title: The Happening | holiday prep and NYC trip recap
description:
Back in their respective hometowns for the holidays, Danielle and Brooke reflect on their New York girls trip and discuss some time-tested wardrobe hacks for utilizing your friends’ closers.

NEW MERCH HERE: https://shop.podcastone.com/collections/gals-on-the-go 

Please check out our channels on YouTube!

Brooke Miccio

Danielle Carolan

Follow @galsonthegopodcast on Instagram to submit your questions for next week’s episode, get involved, and more!
